website_summaries.verdict: A voice amplifier, loudspeaker, and FM radio in one with an impressive battery life.
pros: The rechargeable battery provides up to 20 hours of use
Easy to set up and put to use in an instant, be it in the classroom or boardroom
Breaks through background noise indoors and outdoors
cons: Comes with a longer cable than most

customer_reviews.title: A good little amplifier at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good little amplifier at a good price. Clear sound and enough volume for small groups. Easy to understand the instructions and set it up. It works well for my small groups both indoors and outdoors.I do wish the cable between the head set and the device was a little longer but that is not a complaint about the device, just the way I use it. If you wish to talk to small groups, especially if they are elderly or hard of hearing, this will work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever made for teachers! I have been suffering from laryngitis for over a year now. I strain my voice to teach and it is extremely pain! By the end of the week I sound very raspy. Ever since I've been suing this gadget, I can do a full week of school and be fine at the end of the week. It saves your larynx and forces you to talk low and prevents you from straining your voice. It's a must have for for teachers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOAIY S318
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit that seems to perform well as a mini amp speaker. The sound is clear and you have good volume available. Setting up the FM radio is a bit potluck as the instructions with the unit don't clearly show what button to press to switch to it and the auto station selection just seems to pick up the strongest signals to programme. Therefore the stations picked might not be what you want or just noise. It might be me but that is what I found. Also you need to remember to keep the volume low when setting up as a speaker as you will probably get feedback as you adjust headstone and unit positions.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Once again - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Does this work? yes. It's a basic tool for magnifying your voice for short term, non-critical situations like bus tours. I would not recommend it for speeches due to the tinny sound and lack of anything which resembles a pop filter. It will magnify breath sounds, accidental touching of the device as well. It is not comfortable to wear. It does NOT hold up. I purchased this 4 months ago and the item has had little use. Look at the wear and tear on the ear padding. Spend a few more dollars and get something that eliminates all these issues. Would NOT recommend except for one-time use situations or as a toy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Canty

customer_reviews.title: Love this little PA system
customer_reviews.text: Love this little PA system. Had a conference in a larger venue that had no real place for a mic setup. Had our speaker hook this up and use it. A little screechy when adjusting sometimes but works well .

customer_reviews.title: It Worked Very Well at a Book Launch Event!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a Book Launch Party with 20 guests, and it worked perfectly. The headset is lightweight and looked professional. My only complaint is the included printed instructions were badly written. I had to waste a Saturday afternoon using trial-and-error methods to teach myself how to use the unit. In truth, I didn't figure everything out. For example, I still don't know how to record my voice onto a flash drive while making a presentation. But overall, for the price point, the product is very good. I would purchase it again.

product_meta.description:
WE PROMISE 100% FUND BACK IF YOU DO NOT LIKE IT, WHY NOT HAVE A TRY?

What is a Voice Amplifier Speaker?

It’s a speaking aid - lightweight hands free Voice Amplifier with small size, with the removable and adjustable waistband/belt clip. Our voice amplifier improves the learning and the teaching experience, improves communication and increases effectiveness of classes, lectures, meetings, sales presentations.

Comes with Adjustable Headset Microphone
The headset microphone can be positioned near your mouth with its flexible goose neck design and sits on top of the head so it is stable and won't fall off.

One Key Loop/Repeat Function
When S518 is in MP3 mode with the inserted Micro SD card, press and hold the play/pause button, there will be a voice prompt to tell you the loop one function has been enabled. The specified song or your recorded materials can be repeated all the time.

Fast Recharge with 2000mAh Li-ion battery
Built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery 2000mAh up to 16-20 hours for powerful amplify time and around 7.5 hours for music play time with 60% volume. Recharge in just 4.5 hours.
